Original: <color=#4C99E6>MAJOR ASSISTS ARE ENABLED.</color>
Replacement: <color=#4C99E6>MAJOR ASSISTS ARE ENABLED.</color>

Original: Press '<color=orange>F</color>' to <color=orange>PUNCH</color>.
Replacement: Нажмите '<color=orange>F</color>' чтобы <color=orange>УДАРИТЬ</color>.

Original: Hold '<color=orange>LeftControl</color>' to <color=orange>SLIDE</color>.
Replacement: Зажмите '<color=orange>LeftControl</color>' чтобы <color=orange>СКОЛЬЗИТЬ</color>.

Original:
Press '<color=#00DFFF>LeftShift</color>' to <color=#00DFFF>DASH</color>. (Consumes <color=#00DFFF>STAMINA</color>)
Can be performed in air.
Replacement:
Нажмите '<color=#00DFFF>LeftShift</color>' чтобы совешить <color=#00DFFF>РЫВОК</color>. (Тратит <color=#00DFFF>ВЫНОСЛИВОСТЬ</color>)
Можно выполнить в воздухе.

Original: Deal close range damage to douse yourself in <color=red>FRESH BLOOD</color>. <color=red>THIS IS THE ONLY WAY TO REGAIN HEALTH</color>.
Replacement: Наносите урон в ближнем бою чтобы омыться <color=red>СВЕЖЕЙ КРОВЬЮ</color>. <color=red>ТОЛЬКО ТАК МОЖНО ВОССТАНОВИТЬ ЗДОРОВЬЕ</color>.

Original: <color=orange>JUMP</color> while near a <color=orange>WALL</color> to <color=orange>WALL JUMP</color>. (Max. 3 times)
Replacement: <color=orange>ПРЫГНИТЕ</color> на <color=orange>СТЕНУ</color> чтобы выполнить <color=orange>ПРЫЖОК ОТ СТЕНЫ</color>. (Макс. 3 раза)

Original:
Press '<color=orange>LeftControl</color>' in the air to <color=orange>GROUND SLAM</color>.
Hold for <color=orange>SHOCKWAVE</color>. (Consumes <color=#00DFFF>STAMINA</color>)
Replacement:
PНажмите '<color=orange>LeftControl</color>' в воздухе чтобы выполнить <color=orange>РЫВОК ВНИЗ</color>.
Зажмите для <color=orange>УДАРНОЙ ВОЛНЫ</color>. (Тратит <color=#00DFFF>ВЫНОСЛИВОСТЬ</color>)

Original:
Most levels have secret <color=cyan>SOUL ORBS</color>.
Touch them to get a <color=orange>POINT BONUS</color>.
Replacement:
Большинство уровней имеют секретные <color=cyan>СФЕРЫ ДУШ</color>.
Подберите их для получения <color=orange>БОНУСНЫХ ОЧКОВ</color>.

Original: <color=cyan>REVOLVER</color>: Hold <color=orange>Right Button</color> to charge a <color=orange>PIERCING</color> shot.
Replacement: <color=cyan>REVOLVER</color>: Hold <color=orange>Right Button</color> to charge a <color=orange>PIERCING</color> shot.

Original: <color=orange>PUNCH</color> a <color=orange>PROJECTILE</color> with precise timing to <color=orange>DEFLECT</color> it.
Replacement: <color=orange>PUNCH</color> a <color=orange>PROJECTILE</color> with precise timing to <color=orange>DEFLECT</color> it.

Original: <color=orange>GROUND SLAM</color> (<color=orange>LeftControl</color>) deals damage on direct hit.
Replacement: <color=orange>GROUND SLAM</color> (<color=orange>LeftControl</color>) deals damage on direct hit.

Original: <color=red>INSUFFICIENT FIREPOWER</color>
Replacement: <color=red>INSUFFICIENT FIREPOWER</color>

Original: <color=cyan>SHOTGUN</color>: Press '<color=orange>Right Button</color>' to fire an explosive. Hold to charge distance.
Replacement: <color=cyan>SHOTGUN</color>: Press '<color=orange>Right Button</color>' to fire an explosive. Hold to charge distance.

Original: <color=cyan>SHOTGUN</color>: Primary fire pierces weaker enemies
Replacement: <color=cyan>SHOTGUN</color>: Primary fire pierces weaker enemies

Original: Pick <color=orange>ITEMS</color> up with "<color=orange>F</color>".
Replacement: Pick <color=orange>ITEMS</color> up with "<color=orange>F</color>".

Original: <color=cyan>NAILGUN</color>: Use <color=orange>Right Button</color> to fire a <color=orange>NAIL MAGNET</color>. Can be attached to environment to create traps.
Replacement: <color=cyan>NAILGUN</color>: Use <color=orange>Right Button</color> to fire a <color=orange>NAIL MAGNET</color>. Can be attached to environment to create traps.

Original: A <color=cyan>BLUE FLASH</color> means an attack is <color=cyan>UNPARRIABLE</color>
Replacement: A <color=cyan>BLUE FLASH</color> means an attack is <color=cyan>UNPARRIABLE</color>

Original: Somewhere in the depths of Limbo, a mechanism is set in motion.
Replacement: Somewhere in the depths of Limbo, a mechanism is set in motion.

Original:
<color=red>SPLIT</color> <color=cyan>COLOR</color> doors only require <color=red>ONE</color> <color=cyan>SKULL</color> to open.
If you do not seek hardship, stay indoors.
Replacement:
<color=red>SPLIT</color> <color=cyan>COLOR</color> doors only require <color=red>ONE</color> <color=cyan>SKULL</color> to open.
If you do not seek hardship, stay indoors.

Original: <color=orange>PICK UP</color> TO READ.
Replacement: <color=orange>PICK UP</color> TO READ.

Original:
Nothing happens, but you feel a strange satisfaction.
You decide to name it Hank.
Replacement:
Nothing happens, but you feel a strange satisfaction.
You decide to name it Hank.

Original: <color=orange>ALTERNATE</color> versions will change a weapon's base behavior. They can be equipped at the <color=orange>SHOP</color>.
Replacement: <color=orange>ALTERNATE</color> versions will change a weapon's base behavior. They can be equipped at the <color=orange>SHOP</color>.

Original: Cycle through <color=orange>EQUIPPED</color> arms with '<color=orange>G</color>'
Replacement: Cycle through <color=orange>EQUIPPED</color> arms with '<color=orange>G</color>'

Original: <color=red>KNUCKLE BLASTER</color>: <color=orange>HOLD</color> '<color=orange>F</color>' to create a <color=orange>SHOCKWAVE</color> that knocks enemies back.
Replacement: <color=red>KNUCKLE BLASTER</color>: <color=orange>HOLD</color> '<color=orange>F</color>' to create a <color=orange>SHOCKWAVE</color> that knocks enemies back.

Original: <color=cyan>DASH JUMP</color>: Keep the <color=cyan>DASH</color> momentum by <color=orange>JUMPING</color> during it.
Replacement: <color=cyan>DASH JUMP</color>: Keep the <color=cyan>DASH</color> momentum by <color=orange>JUMPING</color> during it.

Original: Only the <color=cyan>FEEDBACKER</color> (<color=cyan>Blue arm</color>) can <color=orange>PARRY PROJECTILES</color>. Swap arms with '<color=orange>G</color>'.
Replacement: Only the <color=cyan>FEEDBACKER</color> (<color=cyan>Blue arm</color>) can <color=orange>PARRY PROJECTILES</color>. Swap arms with '<color=orange>G</color>'.

Original: <color=cyan>RAILCANNON</color>: <color=orange>RECHARGES</color> even when <color=orange>UNEQUIPPED</color>. Switch weapons to keep fighting between shots.
Replacement: <color=cyan>RAILCANNON</color>: <color=orange>RECHARGES</color> even when <color=orange>UNEQUIPPED</color>. Switch weapons to keep fighting between shots.

Replacement: <color=red>ERROR: BLOCKING DOOR WOULD CLOSE</color>

Replacement: The water has been drained

Replacement: ENEMIES COVERED IN SAND WILL <color=red>NOT BLEED</color>

Replacement: TOMB OF KINGS

Replacement: You're not getting away this time.

Replacement: <color=lime>WHIPLASH</color>: Hold <color=orange>R</color> to throw, release to pull

Replacement: <color=lime>WHIPLASH</color>: Pull <color=orange>light</color> enemies to you, pull yourself to <color=orange>heavy</color> enemies.
